DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety primary immunogenicity quadrivalent human papillomavirus ( type 6 , 11 , 16 , 18 ) recombinant vaccine ( hansenula polymorpha ) Chinese female subject age 9-45 year .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Quadrivalent HPV Recombinant Vaccine
